column3: Latest;Kampong Speu:------ A fire engulfed a chicken farm shed ------at 8:15 am on November 28
column8: ------Kampong Speu province.------The owner of the chicken house named Khem Chan
column13: had around 1000 birds in the shed
column14: which all were burned to a crisp.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/390811
